description: This file provides utility functions for file operations in an Android app, including directory creation, writing text files, copying data from URIs, formatting timecodes, and safe resource closing.

classes.name: FileUtils
classes.description: A singleton object containing static utility methods for handling file operations such as creating directories, writing files, copying data, formatting times, and closing resources safely.

methods.name: createOutputSessionDir
methods.description: Creates a new session directory under the app's filesDir/transcripts with a timestamped name. Throws an IOException if creation fails.

methods.name: writeTextToFile
methods.description: Writes the given string content to the specified file, creating parent directories if necessary. Throws IOException on failure.

methods.name: copyUriToFile
methods.description: Copies data from a content Uri to a specified File, creating necessary parent directories. Throws IOException if the process fails.

methods.name: formatMsToSrtTimecode
methods.description: Formats a duration in milliseconds into an SRT-compatible timecode string 'HH:MM:SS,mmm'. Clamps negative inputs to zero.

methods.name: safeClose
methods.description: Safely closes a Closeable or AutoCloseable resource, swallowing any exceptions.
